text: Hojatoleslam Hassan Sane'i is a governmental official of Iran who is a member of the Expediency Discernment Council.http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/middle_east/279493.stm He is also the president of the 15 Khordad Foundation, a quasi-governmental foundation that was created in 1981.PATTERNS OF GLOBAL TERRORISM, 1994: STATE-SPONSORED TERRORISM OVERVIEWhttp://www.persee.fr/web/revues/home/prescript/article/pop_1634-2941_2002_num_57_2_18397 Sane'i is a fundamentalist who has called for the execution of Salman Rushdie and raised the bounty of the head of the latter for insulting Islam.World: Middle East, Rushdie death bounty raised, BBC, 12 October 1998https://www.amnesty.org/ailib/aireport/ar98/mde13.htmIN THE NAME OF ALLAH: DECEPTION FROM TEHRAN AND THE CASE OF SALMAN RUSHDIE American AtheistsIran Offers a Higher Reward For Assassination of Rushdie New York Times He is brother of the reformist Grand Ayatollah Yousef Saanei. == References and notes == == External links == * The World Outraged by Prize Hike to Kill Rushdie 12 February 1997 Category:Iranian Islamists Category:Iranian clerics Category:Shia Islamists Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Members of the Expediency Discernment Council Category:Association of Combatant Clerics politicians
